inclusion.criterion: Evidence of VT on ICD interrogation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presumed scar related VT post myocardial infarct/dilated cardiomyopathy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ICD implantation for primary or secondary prophylaxis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ventricular tachycardia due to transient, reversible causes
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
